name: add-package-dependency
description: Add a dependency to a package.json-file - what "npm install --save" or "npm install --save-dev" does.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && babel lib --out-dir dist
scripts.watch: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && babel -w lib --out-dir dist
